Class Predict

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object
    Class for predicting shoot angles based on velocities of targets.

    • Method Detail

      • intercept

        public static arc.math.geom.Vec2 intercept(float srcx,
                                           float srcy,
                                           float dstx,
                                           float dsty,
                                           float dstvx,
                                           float dstvy,
                                           float v)
        Calculates of intercept of a stationary and moving target. Do not call from multiple threads!
        Parameters:
        srcx - X of shooter
        srcy - Y of shooter
        dstx - X of target
        dsty - Y of target
        dstvx - X velocity of target (subtract shooter X velocity if needed)
        dstvy - Y velocity of target (subtract shooter Y velocity if needed)
        v - speed of bullet
        Returns:
        the intercept location
